START.name: Enter
START.desc:
You find yourself in the enterance way of a strange house.
The door you used to enter the house will not open, so you will have to find another way out. 
There is an unlocked door to the west and a hallway leading to a kitchen area to the east.

LOC2.name: Kitchen
LOC2.desc:
You head east and enter the kitchen. To the north there appears to be a living room. 
You can also head back west to the entrance way.

LOC3.name: Storage
LOC3.desc:
Through the door lies the houses storage room. 
After a quick search you find that there are no ways out of the storage room except the way you came in to the east.

LOC4.name: Living
LOC4.desc:
In the living room there is a set of couches all facing a TV.
To the north there is a room filled with bookshelves and to the west is a stairway leading downwards.

LOC5.name: Library
LOC5.desc: A dead end, nothing in here but dusty books. The only way is south back to the living room.

LOC6.name: Base
LOC6.desc:
The stairs lead to a dark basement area.
 Unlucky for you! The stairs collapse just as you reach the bottom, leaving no way back up. 
It is hard to make out but you can see a bathroom to the north and a suspicious looking wall to the west.

LOC7.name: Bath
LOC7.desc:
Just like the rest of the basement, the bathroom is dark and hard to see. 
However, this may be for the best. 
There is no way out of the bathroom except the way you came to the south.

LOC8.name: Secret
LOC8.desc:
Just as you suspected, the suspicious wall was more than it seemed. Pressing on the wall causes it to open up to a secret exitway.
 Wanting to escape as quickly as possible, you run through the secret exit.
